description: Integrate on-demand local delivery service into your app.

blocks.name: getDeliveryQuote
blocks.description: This allows you to make decisions about the appropriate cost and availability for using the Postmates platform, which can vary based on distance and demand.

args.name: customerId
args.info: The customer id obtained from Postmates.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The API Key obtained from Postmates.

args.name: pickupAddress
args.info: The pickup address for a potential delivery.

args.name: dropoffAddress
args.info: The dropoff address for a potential delivery.

blocks.name: getDeliveryZones
blocks.description: This endpoint returns a list of GeoJSON-valid FeatureCollection objects representing all of our active delivery zones.

args.name: customerId
args.info: The customer id obtained from Postmates.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The API Key obtained from Postmates.

args.name: customerId
args.info: The customer id obtained from Postmates.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The API Key obtained from Postmates.

args.name: quoteId
args.info: The ID of a previously generated delivery quote. Optional, but recommended.

args.name: manifest
args.info: A detailed description of what the courier will be delivering. Example: "A box of gray kittens".

args.name: manifestReference
args.info: Optional reference that identifies the manifest. Example: "Order #690".

args.name: pickupName
args.info: Name of the place where the courier will make the pickup. Example: "Kitten Warehouse".

args.name: pickupAddress
args.info: The pickup address for the delivery. Example: "20 McAllister St, San Francisco, CA".

args.name: pickupPhoneNumber
args.info: The phone number of the pickup location. Example: "415-555-4242".

args.name: pickupBusinessName
args.info: Optional business name of the pickup location. Example: "Feline Enterprises, Inc.".

args.name: pickupNotes
args.info: Additional instructions for the courier at the pickup location. Example: "Ring the doorbell twice, and only delivery the package if a human answers.".

args.name: dropoffName
args.info: Name of the place where the courier will make the dropoff. Example: "Alice".

args.name: dropoffAddress
args.info: The dropoff address for the delivery. Example: "678 Green St, San Francisco, CA".

args.name: dropoffPhoneNumber
args.info: The phone number of the dropoff location. Example: "415-555-8484".

args.name: dropoffBusinessName
args.info: Optional business name of the dropoff location. Example: "Alice's Cat Cafe".

args.name: dropoffNotes
args.info: Additional instructions for the courier at the dropoff location. Example: "Tell the security guard that you're here to see Alice.".

blocks.name: getAllDeliveries
blocks.description: List all deliveries for a customer.

args.name: customerId
args.info: The customer id obtained from Postmates.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The API Key obtained from Postmates.

args.name: filter
args.info: This filter limits the results to only deliveries that are currently being delivered. Possible value "ongoing".

blocks.name: getDelivery
blocks.description: Retrieve updated details about a delivery.

args.name: customerId
args.info: The customer id obtained from Postmates.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The API Key obtained from Postmates.

args.name: deliveryId
args.info: The ID of the created delivery.

blocks.name: cancelDelivery
blocks.description: Cancel an ongoing delivery. A delivery can only be canceled prior to a courier completing pickup. Delivery fees still apply.

args.name: customerId
args.info: The customer id obtained from Postmates.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The API Key obtained from Postmates.

args.name: deliveryId
args.info: The ID of the created delivery.
